data.name: XMutableTreeNode
desc: Represents a mutable tree node as used by the MutableTreeDataModel.

methods.name: insertChildByIndex
desc: inserts ChildNode to this instance at the given index.

methods.name: removeChildByIndex
desc: removes the node from this instance at the specified index.

methods.name: setCollapsedGraphicURL
desc: The URL for a graphic that is rendered to visualize collapsed non leaf nodes.
If URL is empty, XTreeControl.DefaultCollapsedGraphicURL is used.

methods.name: setDisplayValue
desc: sets the display value of this node

methods.name: setExpandedGraphicURL
desc: The URL for a graphic that is rendered to visualize expanded non leaf nodes.
If URL is empty, XTreeControl.DefaultExpandedGraphicURL is used.

methods.name: setHasChildrenOnDemand
desc: Changes if the children of this node are created on demand.

methods.name: setNodeGraphicURL
desc: The URL for a graphic that is rendered before the text part of this node.
If this URL is empty, no graphic is rendered.

properties.name: DataValue
desc: You can use this attribute to store data for this node that is independent of the display value
